divs: sighting detailsok, saturday evening dec 29th 2007 was when i first started to record these objects, but i've seen them on and off for at least two years. they appear as balls of light\flame, they brighten up at first and then kind of fizzle down before they start to move. at first they would stay in the same area, but after watching them over the course of 26 days (on and off) i've seen them travel around allover, some of them look like headlights in the dark, some of them are triangles, they change color and shape.i dont know if its some kind of government experiment, or if its something else, all i know is that i have something very strange on video im not computer literate so i dont know how to transfer from my dvd recorder to files i can send online. how can we work something out so that someone can come check them out? i work in mid town manhattan. im also a mufon member. -ryan
